components/header/account-button:
{{#if settings.account_creation_enabled}} {{#if customer}}
{{> svg/icon-account}} {{lang 'header.account'}} {{> svg/icon-dropdown}}
  • {{lang 'header.my_account'}}
  • {{lang 'header.my_orders'}}
  • {{lang 'header.log_out'}}
{{else}} {{> svg/icon-account}} {{lang 'header.account'}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
svg/icon-account:
<svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="presentation" title="Account">
  <path d="M18 12.5V12H0v6h1v-5h16v5h1v-5.5zM9 10c-2.76 0-5-2.24-5-5s2.24-5 5-5 5 2.24 5 5-2.24 5-5 5zm0-1c2.21 0 4-1.79 4-4s-1.79-4-4-4-4 1.79-4 4 1.79 4 4 4z" fill="currentColor"/>
</svg>
svg/icon-dropdown:
<svg width="6" height="3" viewBox="0 0 6 3" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <path d="M6 0L3 3 0 0h6z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd"/>
</svg>
